name: Metro Interstate Human Traffic Volume
description: Hourly Interstate 94 Westbound traffic volume for MN DoT ATR station 301, roughly midway between Minneapolis and St Paul, MN. Hourly weather features and holidays included for impacts on traffic volume.

name: Beijing-Guanyuan Air-Quality
description: This hourly data set considers 6 main air pollutants and 6 relevant meteorological variables at multiple sites in Beijing.

name: Solar Generation - EnerjiSA
description: Solar generation data of unlicenced solar centrals in Ankara
